Title: Mademoiselle
Actors: Jeanne Moreau, Ettore Manni, Keith Skinner, Umberto Orsini
Plot: In a French village, Manou is an Italian logger, virile, with a broad laugh. He can't say no to women's sexual invitations, and jealous villagers blame him for recent fires and a flood. He ...
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 nominations.
